mapper.select: select widget_seq, x_location, y_location, menu_id, z_index, menu_typenumber from kang_widget;
mapper.insert: insert into kang_widget( widgets_seq, x_location, y_location, menu_id, z_index, menu_typenumber ) values( (select nvl(max(widgets_seq),0)+1 from kang_widget), null, null, #{menuId}, #{zIndex}, #{menuTypenumber} )
